Posts.Content: May 21, 2015 01:08PM DianaJoP wrote: What a relief to hear so many others experiencing the same issues I am having. I had a lumpectomy in 2003. Still feeling the "zings" and have more than occasional tenderness in the area of the lumpectomy. I mentioned this to my doctor a few months ago and was just told "not to worry about it." I would have liked to have known that this is not uncommon. I was starting to feel like I was "just a baby" or imagining the continued discomfort. Don't get me wrong, I am grateful that this is just discomfort and feel blessed to be alive. Thank you to all of you strong women for your posts. You have given me peace.
Posts.Title: Pain in lumpectomy site years later Rachel1 mom2bunky
